task.description: Upgrade any piece of equipment (gun, armor, etc.) to a higher level.
Complete all stages within a single chapter.
Use the Sweep feature to quickly claim rewards from a previously completed chapter.
Upgrade your tank to a higher level.
Increase the Star rating (Star up) of your tank to boost its power.

task.info: Buy a daily item in shop {n} time
task.description: Purchase any daily item from the Shop.

task.info: Claim a daily item in shop {n} time
task.description: Claim a free daily item in the Shop.

task.info: Open a chest in shop {n} time
task.description: Open any Chest available in the Shop.
Claim the accumulated AFK/Idle rewards two times.
Defeat a total of 100 enemies across all game stages.
Defeat a total of 3 bosses in the game stages.
